awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: In this, the sequel to Jean de Florette, Manon (Beart) has grown into a beautiful young shepherdess living in the idyllic Provencal countryside. She determines to take revenge upon the men responsible for the death of her father in the first film.
plot: A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.
title: Manon of the Spring
